message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a special introductory price of $140. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but I can't go quite that low. How about we meet in the middle at $125?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $110?
